quests.name: A Rat Problem
quests.description: Azzan in Anvil wants you to see Arvena Thelas regarding a rat problem in her basement.

quests.name: The Unfortunate Shopkeeper
quests.description: Stop some thieves from robbing a local shopkeeper.

quests.name: The Desolate Mine
quests.description: Deliver a weapons shipment to the Desolate Mine.

quests.name: Unfinished Business
quests.description: Travel to Skingrad to find out why Maglir has defaulted on a contract.

quests.name: Drunk and Disorderly
quests.description: Find out why several of your guildmates are causing trouble in Leyawiin.

quests.name: Den of Thieves
quests.description: A gang of Bosmer thieves has been causing some problems around Anvil.

quests.name: Amelion's Debt
quests.description: Help Biene Amelion satisfy a debt by retrieving an heirloom.

quests.name: The Master's Son
quests.description: The Fighters Guild has been hired to find Galtus Previa, and Viranus Donton needs a confidence boost.

quests.name: More Unfinished Business
quests.description: Find out why a guild member has defaulted on yet another contract in Bravil.

quests.name: Azani Blackheart
quests.description: Help Modryn prove that the Blackwood Company lied about completing a contract to kill Azani Blackheart.

quests.name: The Fugitives
quests.description: Find and kill some fugitives that have been causing trouble near Bravil.

quests.name: The Wandering Scholar
quests.description: Elante of Alinor wishes to study a Daedric shrine and needs protection.

quests.name: Trolls of Forsaken Mine
quests.description: Viranus Donton and some Fighters Guild members were sent to eliminate trolls at Forsaken Mine, and now you must find them.

quests.name: The Stone of St. Alessia
quests.description: The Stone of St. Alessia has been stolen from the Chapel of Talos in Bruma.

quests.name: The Noble's Daughter
quests.description: Find Lord Rugdumph gro-Shurgak's missing daughter.

quests.name: Mystery at Harlun's Watch
quests.description: Investigate the disappearance of some locals from Harlun's Watch.

quests.name: Information Gathering
quests.description: Bring Ajum-Kajin - a high-ranking Blackwood Company member - back to Modryn and "persuade" him to talk.

quests.name: Infiltration
quests.description: Deceive your way into the Blackwood Company and discover why they are so powerful... or so crazy.

quests.name: The Hist
quests.description: Return to Blackwood Company headquarters to destroy the source of their power and anyone that stands in your way.
